name: Subterranean (gnashley)
description:
A quick 5 - 10 minute game centered around the theme of 'escape'.  Blast your way through a dark cavern infested with cave creatures and dark spirits!

Art and game made by Dennis Zuniga (zunigad.itch.io), David Zatopek (gnashley.itch.io), and Martin Dao.

Sounds made by: Mike Koenig, Daniel Simion, Man ,BlastwaveFx.com

Download size: 130 MB

Made in Unreal Engine 4
